For the first time ever, bats made of the legendary Kashmir willow will make an official appearance at the 50-over Cricket World Cup scheduled to be held in October in India.

articles.title: 'The Korean Zombie' Admits Quality Of Performance Against Max Holloway Will Determine MMA Retirement - MMA News
articles.description: "The Korean Zombie" Chan Sung Jung has noted that his display against Max Holloway will ultimately determine whether or not he hangs up the gloves.
articles.content:
One of the all-time leading fan favorites in the featherweight division is back in action this weekend, but he'll make the walk with an uncertain future.

articles.title: Durand Cup 2023: NorthEast United FC reach semi-final after a narrow win over the Indian Army - Indian Super League
articles.description: Phalguni Singh’s strike in the second-half made all the difference as NorthEast United FC pipped Indian Army by a goal to nil in the first quart-final of the 2023 Durand Cup at the Indira Gandhi Athletic Stadium in Guwahati on Thursday.
